rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0001
rows.name:
It's really nice to have some more
company around here. Really makes
fighting a breeze, too.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0002
rows.name:
Well yeah, what did you expect?
The monsters around here don't
stand a chance against me.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0003
rows.name:
Your powers are on a completely
different level, true.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0004
rows.name:
But that's not what Laura was trying
to say, Grail

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0005
rows.name:
Laura doesn't think of Blades as mere
tools of their Drivers. To her they're
partners in arms. Am I right?

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0007
rows.name:
When I said we had more company,
I was talking about all three of you.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0008
rows.name:
I don't care whether you're a Blade or
a Driver! I'm just happy that we get to
share our time together.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0009
rows.name:
OK, then. That's a pretty weird way
of thinking, if you ask me.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Um, should we perhaps be on our
way to Yanchik Harbor now?

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0012
rows.name:
If we keep to the road, it should take
us straight there.

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0013
rows.name:
The regular boat from Yanchik to
Gula, is it?

rows.label: fev11_140_150_msg0014
rows.name:
As far as I know, it's still running. But
we should probably hurry all the same.
